comments: Worst professor ever ! Save your time and effort for better professors. She is not the one for Bio ! Her tests are "beyond belief". We have done with 2 of her exams and I got an unexpected grade even though I am an A student. Take another professor please !

Simply the best instructor!Follow her power point notes,make flash cards and record her lectures.Bought the books better off following her notes.Study hard and you will do well in her class.Thank you Dr. G!!

Fink who? Geisbauer is where it\'s at as far as WLA science teachers. No need to buy the book - tests are straight out of notes. You can rent any Physio book if you want to read more. Write down and learn anything she puts on the board, those are the short answer responses. Explains things nicely and gives students plenty of chances to get an A!

TAKE THIS TEACHER! MANDATORY ATTENDANCE, BOOK USED HAS FREE ONLINE SITE, JUST RENT IT, MINIMAL USE. USES POWERPOINTS, HELPFUL, FUNNY, CAN CONVEY A TOUGH SUBJECT WITH COMPLETE UNDERSTANDING. 4 TESTS, FINAL CUMULATIVE, SOME QUIZES, SOME LAB. SHES AWESOME, TAKE HER!

Although Carrie explains herself in a way that may be entertaining & easy to remember/comprehend, I felt that she was too easy. For exams, I was disappointed that I knew more info than what was actually tested. Additionally, she tends to babble about her personal life & goes off on random tangents which made the class lag behind a bit. An easy A.

She is an excellent professor, but you cannot miss any classes. She gives quizzes that are cumulitive to the finals and is very clear. Teaches with slides and very helpful when you need help after class. I stongly recommend her and advise that you review the chapters and summaries she gives before class at least 2 to 3 hours everyday for a A+!

She is an amazing teacher I wish she taught all the sciences, she makes it all make sense and come together she is a phenomenal teacher! She makes hard information more understandable you do have to study hard if want a good grade but the information is crystal clear!

Awsome!Could not get into SMC physio class with her I did here@WLAC.Spent hours studying and asking so many questions finally got it!Yes she returns e-mails.I am not a science student earned a great grade!
Too easy of a class, don\'t know what else to say.

She is simply awesome!!! Our class starts at 8am on a Saturday and yet she could still make everything interesting. Her ppt is very helpful and informative. You will definitely love her. I\'m looking forward to our Physio class! ^o^

She is a great and wonderful teacher. Her ppt are brief and wellsummarized. She is very reasonable and understanding. I took her in both Physiology and anatomy at the same time and my grades were superb. I highly recommend her.

She is an Excellent Professor, who would give anything for all her students to get an A+. She does her best to summaries, slides, chapters, quizes and exams. If you did not go to school to get a baby sitter, then you are guaranteed an A+ and if you encountered difficulties at least a B+! Everyone should take her class for Anatomy and Physiology!

She is great, she totally wants you to learn and will continue to teach it until you learn it. She is fun, and really is interactive which helps with remembering key points. I would recommend her to everyone. Taking her for physio. Little book use, use her PPT\'s and come to class she only gives questions from lecture.
she shouldn\'t teach colledge level courses. not capable to transfer correct and complete information. she should teach acting instead of Biology....
